original_title: Three brothers arrested with stolen items worth Rs. 2.1 million
original_body_lines: Police have arrested three brothers from the same family who had engaged in robberies in multiple areas, along with several stolen items worth around Rs. 2.1 million in Athurugiriya.
The trio has robbed several items from 18 locations within Athurugiriya, Kadawatha, Thalangama and Kaduwela police divisions, the police said.
The arrested suspects, who are aged 29, 32 and 36 years, are residents of Angoda and Kaduwela.
They have several pending arrest warrants against them, according to police.
Athurugiriya Police said that the arrested suspects will be produced before Kaduwela Magistrate’s Court.
